Title: Optimistic Concurrency in an HTTP API with ETags & Hypermedia
Description: How do you implement optimistic concurrency in an HTTP API? Using ETag and If-Match HTTP Headers or leveraging Hypermedia.

Title: Visual Studio for Mac 2022 -- Visual Studio Magazine
